name: convert_all.sh
description: Batch convert all MP4 files in current folder using FFmpeg (e.g., to H.265 or lower bitrate)

name: crop.sh
description: Interactively crop video using FFmpeg; prompts for x,y,w,h coordinates

name: FFprobeVideoSizes.sh
description: List resolution, duration, and codec of all videos in folder

name: find_prompt.sh
description: Search all prompt.txt files in Projects/ for a keyword (e.g., 'cat')

name: list_by_clients.sh
description: List top-level client folders and project counts (structured asset overview)

name: new_project.sh
description: Create new project folder under Projects/ with ID, date, and basic structure

name: new_scene.sh
description: Scaffold new scene folder with prompts/, img/, vid/ subdirs

name: rename_files.sh
description: Bulk rename files to sequential numbers (e.g., clip_001.mp4, clip_002.mp4)

name: scaleVideos.sh
description: Resize all videos in folder to target resolution (e.g., 1280x720) using FFmpeg

name: set_sequence.sh
description: Rename image files to 0001.png, 0002.png... for FFmpeg video encoding

name: spin_rotate_zoom.sh
description: Rotate or flip video 90°/180°/mirror using FFmpeg (stream copy when possible)

name: strip_audio.sh
description: Remove audio track from all MP4 files in folder (fast, no re-encode)

name: sync_manifest.sh
description: Update MANIFEST.tsv with current project/scene metadata

name: test_print.sh
description: Debug helper: print environment variables, paths, or test logic

name: xdg-open-img.sh
description: Open image or video in default viewer (Chromebook/Linux compatible)

name: ffmpeg-multi-audio-mix.sh
description: Mix 3 audio tracks with fade/volume, copy video

name: add_audio.sh
description: Add single audio to video (copy video stream)

name: assemble_story.sh
description: Assemble video from cuts.tsv, optionally add audio

name: new_story_project.sh
description: Create multilingual story project with cuts.tsv

name: analyze_video_list.sh
description: Analyze video resolutions/durations from concat list
